name: Nature Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
The Nature Jigsaw Puzzles has builtin gallery with high definition photos.
Pick a picture from the Nature Jigsaw Puzzles gallery, select a level and enjoy.
There are five categories of pictures, that can be turned into a different nature jigsaw puzzles. If you enable the kids mode it will became a perfect Kids Jigsaw Puzzle game.

Our gallery categories:
* Bulgaria
* Nature
* Animals
* Cat
* Dog
* Chicken
* Snake
* Ducklet
* Urban
* Prague
* Paris
* Flowers

The puzzle features:
* It is not required to have internet access to play the puzzle game (works in offline mode)
* Many nice high definition pictures sorted in a cute gallery
* Lots of difficulty levels
* Smooth game-play. (Uses the hardware acceleration of the device.)
* Game timer.
* Share result/picture.
* Multitouch zoom and piece rotation
* Zoom In / Out.
* Piece rotation.
* Save game.
* Best score statistics.
* Set picture as wallpaper.
* Nice background nature music.
* Magical sound effects.
* Vibration on piece merge.
* The Nature jigsaw puzzles is free.
* Kids mode
